none: scrape/2023-04-acid-pigs/extracted/Acid Pigs/05 You're Punk, We're Not
scrape/2023-04-acid-pigs/extracted/Acid Pigs/08 You Shook Me All Night Long

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 26, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
Two middle fingers from ACID PIGS to the stupid fucks who dismiss the late '80s (and the decade that followed, for that matter).  Imagine some kids from Denver getting sloppy drunk, blasting NOTA and early NYHC then and piling into mom's garage and just going hard. Rehearsal demo? Yeah, it's raw. Don't even know if this is (was) a proper demo or just a relic a time when your mailbox was the window to the underworld. I had heard them on the Colorado Krew comps but one song on a comp (even a slammer like "White Lie") is less likely to stick with you than a collection of heat like this...even with the stupid AC/DC cover. Someone needs to give this shit the proper treatment. ACID PIGS
